      </p>
      <p>
       The Informatics and Computing Program (ICP) at Northern Arizona University is aimed at building interdisciplinary research capacity and future innovation in the intersection of computational science with engineering, the natural and social sciences, the arts, and business. We view informatics as
       <em>
        computing in context
       </em>
       : an essentially interdisciplinary area where fundamental advances in computational science support research breakthroughs in application areas.
      </p>
      <p>
       Our diverse faculty work with other university and regional researchers to incorporate informatics as an essential element of research and learning through collaborative research projects, joint courses, and new degree program development.
      </p>
      <h4>
       Research Labs
      </h4>
      <p>
       To read more about the Informatics and Computing Program's research labs, please visit their websites:
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <a href="http://www.fofanovlab.us/" target="_blank">
         Fofanov Bioinformatics Lab
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="http://www2.nau.edu/ogle-lab/" target="_blank">
         Ogle Lab: Ecological Synthesis Lab
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="https://sites.google.com/a/nau.edu/remote-sensing-lab/" target="_blank">
         Remote Sensing and Geoinformatics Lab
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <h4>
       Partners
      </h4>
      <p>
       Our research is supported through collaborations with NAU entities such as:
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <a href="http://nau.edu/cbi/" target="_blank">
         Center for Bioengineering Innovation
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="http://www.mggen.nau.edu/" target="_blank">
         Center for Microbial Genetics and Genomics
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="http://nau.edu/ecoss/" target="_blank">
         Center for Ecosystem Science and Society
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="https://nau.edu/cefns/natsci/seses/welcome/" target="_blank">
         School of Earth Sciences and Environmental Sustainability
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="http://nau.edu/merriam-powell/" target="_blank">
         Merriam-Powell Center for Environmental Research
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="http://www.physics.nau.edu/" target="_blank">
         Department of Physics and Astronomy
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       Our regional partners include:
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <a href="https://www.tgen.org/" target="_blank">
         Translational Genomics Research Institute
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="http://www.nahealth.com/" target="_blank">
         Northern Arizona Healthcare
        </a>
        and
        <a href="http://www.flagstaffmedicalcenter.com/" target="_blank">
         Flagstaff Medical Center
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="http://www.northcountryhealthcare.org/" target="_blank">
         North Country HealthCare
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="http://www.usgs.gov/" target="_blank">
         U.S. Geological Survey
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="https://napsaconsortium.wordpress.com/" target="_blank">
         Northern Arizona Planetary Science Alliance
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
